dc_title_s: Colton's railroad & township map of the state of New York : with parts of the adjoining states & Canada
dc_description_s: Hand colored.; Relief shown by hachures.; Shows population statistics.; "Entered according to Act of Congress in the year 1852, by J.H. Colton, in the clerks office of the dist. court for the southern dist. of N. York."; Prime meridians: Washington and Greenwich.|56 x 64 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:1,000,000|General Map Collection
